info.introduction: Hi! My name is Jonatas, I'm a Full-Stack Developer. I work with highly complex applications that serve thousands of users worldwide.
info.myWork: A 4 year experienced Full Stack Web Developer, graduated in Information Systems at University of S達o Paulo and with great industry experience building websites and web applications.
